stories.title: The Curious Little Rabbit
stories.text: Once upon a time there was a curious little rabbit. Every morning he left his burrow to explore the forest. One day he found a golden butterfly shining in the sun. The rabbit decided to follow it and a wonderful adventure began.

stories.title: The Magic Forest
stories.text: In the heart of a magic forest lived a blue unicorn. She sang to make the flowers grow. One day she met a lost girl. Together they made the whole clearing bloom again.
